Rulings.Tengu:
●If a replay occurs when Jirai Gumo attacks and you decide to continue attacking with Jirai Gumo, you do not flip the coin again.
●If your opponent has Toll, you must pay the cost for Toll before flipping the coin for Jirai Gumo

Rulings.Base: 1. If a replay occurs when "Jirai Gumo" attacks and you decide to continue attacking with "Jirai Gumo", you do not flip the coin again.\n2. If your opponent has "Toll", you must pay the cost for "Toll" before flipping the coin for "Jirai Gumo"
